paper_abstract: A blocking semioval in a projective plane is a set of points which is both a semioval and a blocking set. In this paper, blocking semiovals in the Desaguesian projective plane admitting an order homology group are considered. The geometry of the point-orbits of such a group is studied. Using this geometry two new blocking semiovals are constructed in . Their automorphism group is also discussed.
paper_title: Some blocking semiovals of homology type in planes of square order
